sentence: And state Treasurer Sarah Godlewski released a digital ad that spliced violent images of the attacks on Jan. 6 against Johnson's remarks on TV defending those who were at the Capitol that day.
title: Biden gives Democrats the anti-Trump speech they've been waiting for
